__dashboard.heatmap_message: This is based on stock movement. See Stock Ledger for details

metas.name: Item

fields.label: Variant Of
fields.description: If item is a variant of another item then description, image, pricing, taxes etc will be set from the template unless explicitly specified
fields.name: 2387b0df04

fields.label: Allow over delivery or receipt upto this percent
fields.name: 7ef39c89bb

fields.label: Default Material Request Type
fields.options:
Purchase
Material Transfer
Material Issue
Manufacture
fields.name: 882fa144c3

fields.label: Reorder level based on Warehouse
fields.description: Will also apply for variants unless overrridden
fields.name: 8406c406cd

fields.label: Batch Number Series
fields.description: Example: ABCD.#####. If series is set and Batch No is not mentioned in transactions,then automatic batch number will be created based on this series. If you always want to explicitly mention Batch No for this item,leave this blank. Note: this setting will take priority over the Naming Series Prefix in Stock Settings.
fields.name: b9ad912584

fields.label: Max Sample Quantity
fields.description: Maximum sample quantity that can be retained
fields.name: 6251a283c7

fields.label: Serial Number Series
fields.description:
Example: ABCD.#####
If series is set and Serial No is not mentioned in transactions,then automatic serial number will be created based on this series. If you always want to explicitly mention Serial Nos for this item. leave this blank.
fields.name: 77562c6c9e

fields.label: Has Variants
fields.description: If this item has variants,then it cannot be selected in sales orders etc.
fields.name: a2605fa63c

fields.label: Lead Time in days
fields.description: Average time taken by the supplier to deliver
fields.name: 8216d55e99

fields.label: Contract Type
fields.name: Item-contract_type
fields.options:
Service Contract
Consumable Contract
Promise Contract

fields.label: Weightage
fields.description: Items with higher weightage will be shown higher
fields.name: e7d0885952

fields.label: Slideshow
fields.description: Show a slideshow at the top of the page
fields.name: 20c4328f99

fields.label: Website Warehouse
fields.description: Show "In Stock" or "Not in Stock" based on stock available in this warehouse.
fields.name: 81eac445ce

fields.label: Website Item Groups
fields.description: List this Item in multiple groups on the website.
fields.name: 5a7abbd92d

fields.label: Hub Warehouse
fields.description: Publish "In Stock" or "Not in Stock" on Hub based on stock available in this warehouse.
fields.name: f0e6b50f74

metas.description: A Product or a Service that is bought, sold or kept in stock.

fields.label: Change Qty with Parent
fields.description: This will make this option's quantity multiply with parent item's qty
fields.name: 6283e3d30e

metas.name: Item Customer Detail
metas.description: For the convenience of customers, these codes can be used in print formats like Invoices and Delivery Notes

metas.name: Website Item Group
metas.description: Cross Listing of Item in multiple groups

metas.name: Item Website Specification
metas.description: Table for Item that will be shown in Web Site
